eu_initiatives: Norgine was involved in activities around file 2012/0266 for Medical Devices.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
relevant_communication:
in 2016, Norgine worked with a hired consultancy Decideum Ltd to engage members of the European Parliament, Commission and Council on the subject of the medical device file (2012/0266). This largely consisted of the arrangement of meetings with relevant policy-makers to discuss the fulfilment of the aims and objectives of the file, to provide useful technical and contextual information relating to industry practice and to suggest improvements to the file where this is both applicable and appropriate.  
Norgine monitored the activities of all three European institutions in order to inform the activities described above.
goals__remit: Norgine B.V. is a European specialist pharma company which develops, manufactures and commercialises specialist products in the EU.
